name: enchantingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very pleasant or attractive: She had never been there before, and everything seemed enchantingly new to her. She was enchantingly pretty, with dark shining curls and beautiful skin. Related word
enchantingSynonym
bewitchingly
More examplesFewer examplesThe scenery along the coast is enchantingly beautiful.The women's voices combined enchantingly in the chorus.The village is so enchantingly pretty that it looks like a painting.He could talk enchantingly for hours on any subject you mention.The hills and valleys form some of the most enchantingly scenic countryside in the region.
